info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 24 at 5:14PM EDT until July 24 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia SC
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following county, Orangeburg.
* WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Orangeburg County Airport ASOS reported 1.13 inches in 21 minutes. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Claflin College, Rowesville, Cordova, Cope, Edisto and Wilkinson Heights. - This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 148 and 154. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don't drown.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING
